question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:
•	 give contact details for when you are away
•	 give instructions on how to care for your pet
•	 describe other household duties
text: I’m writing to you to say thank you for agreeing to look after my house & pet while I’m on my holiday. I’m very grateful for your help as it means a lot to me. I’ll be going out for the vacation from 1st September to 5th September, 19.

I’ve mentioned my contact number & other emergency numbers on the sticky note on the fridge. You are free to call me anytime, in case my number is not reachable you can try the other numbers mentioned below it. I’ve kept my dog’s food in the top right corner drawer of the kitchen. You need to feed him twice a day in his favorite bowl kept next to his food. Also, you need to water the plants once in the morning & keep the daily newspapers inside on my study desk.
I hope my dog won’t trouble you much and you’ll enjoy his company till I come. Take care see you soon.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
The spelling of favorite is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
